english.segment1: (Anyways I told the guy, 'Nice coat! Who shot the couch?!')(laughter). (Hey how ya doin today?)
english.segment3: (Eh, that's dandy. Hey, what can I get for ya?)
english.segment4: I would like a triple skinny, two-thirds decaf, half chocolate, no whip-
english.segment5: (Hey-uh, hold up here, lemme break out the pen here, we got kinda a tall order goin on)
english.segment6: I would like a triple skinny, two-thirds decaf, half chocolate no whip Grande Mocha.
english.segment7: Oh yeah, extra foam. To go-o-o.
